name: lie
chn: vi. 躺, 平卧; 位于
example_en: The cat lies on the sofa all day.
memory_tips: 词源：来自古英语 'licgan'，意为躺下。联想记忆：想象一个人躺在草地上，享受阳光。图像记忆：画一个人躺在沙滩上，旁边是海浪。

image_prompt.main_image: A person lying on a grassy field under the sun, with a relaxed posture and a smile on their face.
image_prompt.example_image: A cat lying comfortably on a soft sofa, with sunlight streaming through a nearby window.

collocations: lie down (躺下); white lie (善意的谎言); lie detector (测谎仪)
